title: Requires employers to register for E-verify program for verification of employment eligibility; establishes a tax credit for employers with less than fifty employees
actClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring public and private employers to register for and participate in the E-verify program for verification of employment eligibility; and to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a tax credit for employers with less than fifty employees that register for the E-verify program by a certain time AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to requiring public and private employers to register for and participate in the E-verify program for verification of employment eligibility; and to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a tax credit for employers with less than fifty employees that register for the E-verify program by a certain time
